BackstoryDef.title: slaver collarer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in capturing live prey for the slaver markets. [PAWN_pronoun] perfected the use of shock collars and mesmetrons to subdue targets without killing them.

BackstoryDef.title: slave overseer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] kept slaves in line through brutality and fear. [PAWN_pronoun] became an expert at breaking spirits and maximizing productivity from captive labor.

BackstoryDef.title: slave trader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dealt in human cargo, negotiating prices and arranging sales across the wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] viewed people as nothing more than commodities to be bought and sold.

BackstoryDef.title: Paradise Falls slaver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] operated out of Paradise Falls, the infamous slaver hub. [PAWN_pronoun] raided settlements and captured wastelanders to sell at the slave markets.

BackstoryDef.title: former slave turned slaver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a slave who earned freedom by betraying fellow captives. [PAWN_pronoun] now works for the masters, using intimate knowledge of slave psychology to prevent escapes.

BackstoryDef.title: Pitt recruiter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] "recruited" workers for The Pitt's steel mills. [PAWN_pronoun] used lies and force to trick or capture people into a lifetime of industrial slavery.

BackstoryDef.title: child catcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in capturing children for the slave markets. Young slaves fetched high prices, and [PAWN_pronoun] had no qualms about orphaning families.

BackstoryDef.title: collar technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained the electronic slave collars that kept captives compliant. [PAWN_pronoun] ensured every collar was properly calibrated to deliver maximum pain without killing the merchandise.

BackstoryDef.title: slave caravan guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] escorted slave caravans across dangerous wasteland territories. [PAWN_pronoun] became skilled at preventing escapes while fending off raiders and wildlife.

BackstoryDef.title: slave breaker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in "breaking in" new slaves, crushing their will to resist through psychological and physical torture. [PAWN_pronoun] took pride in creating obedient chattel.

BackstoryDef.title: slave appraiser
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] evaluated captured slaves to determine their market value. [PAWN_pronoun] assessed physical condition, skills, and potential uses with cold, calculating efficiency.

BackstoryDef.title: slaver raid leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led raiding parties to capture fresh slaves from settlements and caravans. [PAWN_pronoun] planned ambushes and coordinated attacks to maximize captures while minimizing damage to the merchandise.

BackstoryDef.title: slave pen keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed the holding pens where slaves were kept before sale. [PAWN_pronoun] kept them alive and presentable while ensuring none could escape.

BackstoryDef.title: mesmetron specialist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] mastered the use of the mesmetron, a device that hypnotizes targets into submission. [PAWN_pronoun] could capture marks without a fight, making them walk willingly into bondage.

BackstoryDef.title: slaver enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as muscle for slaving operations, intimidating both slaves and rivals. [PAWN_pronoun] dealt with escape attempts through brutal public punishments.

BackstoryDef.title: vault dweller hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in raiding vaults for their inhabitants. Vault dwellers were prized as slaves - healthy, educated, and unused to wasteland hardships made them easy to control.

BackstoryDef.title: slave auctioneer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] conducted slave auctions, driving up prices through showmanship and manipulation. [PAWN_pronoun] presented human beings like livestock, emphasizing their qualities to maximize profits.

BackstoryDef.title: escaped slave tracker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] hunted down escaped slaves across the wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] used tracking skills and knowledge of the terrain to recapture runaways, making brutal examples of them.

BackstoryDef.title: slave chem dealer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] kept slaves addicted to chems to ensure compliance. [PAWN_pronoun] controlled the supply, making slaves dependent and desperate for their next fix.

BackstoryDef.title: branding master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] marked slaves with hot irons or tattoos to denote ownership. [PAWN_pronoun] took grim satisfaction in permanently marking captives as property.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal initiate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Jackals, a savage raider gang known for their brutality. [PAWN_pronoun] proved themselves through violence and cruelty to earn a place among the pack.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal ambusher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in setting up ambushes along roads and trade routes for the Jackals. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to strike fast, take what they could carry, and disappear before help arrived.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal pack leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led a pack of Jackal raiders through intimidation and proven kills. [PAWN_pronoun] earned respect through savage brutality and successful raids.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] picked through the remains of Jackal raids, salvaging weapons, supplies, and anything valuable from corpses. [PAWN_pronoun] had no qualms about looting the dead.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] kept other Jackals in line through fear and violence. [PAWN_pronoun] dealt with cowards, traitors, and anyone who challenged the pack's authority with brutal efficiency.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal raider
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] raided caravans and settlements with the Jackals, taking whatever wasn't nailed down and killing anyone who resisted. [PAWN_pronoun] lived for the thrill of violence and plunder.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scouted targets for Jackal raids, tracking caravans and identifying weak settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] had a keen eye for vulnerable prey.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal bruiser
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the muscle for Jackal operations, breaking down doors and overwhelming defenders through sheer force. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred close combat where they could feel bones break.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal gunner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] provided covering fire during Jackal raids, keeping defenders pinned while the pack closed in. [PAWN_pronoun] took pride in their accuracy and kill count.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal torturer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] extracted information from captives through pain and fear. The Jackals had no mercy for prisoners, and [PAWN_pronoun] made sure everyone knew it.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal cannibal
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] embraced the most savage traditions of the Jackals, consuming the flesh of their enemies. [PAWN_pronoun] believed it granted them the strength of the conquered.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal wasteland survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] survived the harsh wasteland through cunning and the protection of the Jackal pack. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that only the strong survive, and mercy is a luxury.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal drug runner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] smuggled chems and drugs for the Jackals, both to sell and to keep the pack hopped up on combat stims during raids. [PAWN_pronoun] sampled the merchandise frequently.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal demolitionist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] handled explosives for the Jackals, blowing open vaults, destroying fortifications, and creating chaos during raids. [PAWN_pronoun] loved the sound of destruction.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal war boy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the Jackal gang, knowing nothing but violence and raiding. [PAWN_pronoun] seeks glory in combat and dreams of dying in battle.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal bounty hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tracked down marks for the Jackals - escaped slaves, rival gang members, and anyone with a price on their head. [PAWN_pronoun] always brought them back, dead or alive.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal camp guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded Jackal camps and safehouses from rival gangs and NCR patrols. [PAWN_pronoun] stayed alert for threats while the pack slept.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal executioner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carried out executions for the Jackals, killing prisoners, traitors, and anyone who crossed the gang. [PAWN_pronoun] made deaths public and brutal to send a message.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal mechanic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] kept Jackal vehicles and weapons functioning through scavenged parts and improvised repairs. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make do with whatever scraps were available.

BackstoryDef.title: Jackal berserker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] flew into violent rages during combat, attacking with reckless abandon. The Jackals valued [PAWN_objective] as a weapon pointed at their enemies.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper cultist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Vipers, a cult that worships the Great Serpent. [PAWN_pronoun] believes that venom purifies the wasteland and that snakes are sacred creatures.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper venom master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] mastered the art of extracting and weaponizing snake venom. [PAWN_pronoun] coated blades and arrows with deadly toxins, making every wound potentially fatal.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper snake handler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to the sacred serpents kept by the Vipers, feeding them and harvesting their venom. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to handle even the deadliest snakes without fear.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper priest
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] preached the gospel of the Great Serpent, leading rituals and converting wastelanders to the Viper faith. [PAWN_pronoun] believed venom was a gift from the divine.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper poison blade
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in close combat with venom-coated weapons. Every cut [PAWN_pronoun] inflicted carried deadly toxins that would slowly kill even armored foes.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper assassin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] hunted targets for the Vipers, using poisoned weapons to ensure kills. [PAWN_pronoun] struck from the shadows, leaving victims to die slowly from venom.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper fangbearer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen to bear the sacred fangs - implanted snake teeth that marked [PAWN_objective] as one of the faithful. [PAWN_pronoun] lived for the cult's twisted ideology.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper toxic raider
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] raided caravans and settlements, spreading the Vipers' toxic influence. [PAWN_pronoun] used poison gas and venomous weapons to incapacitate victims.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper venom brewer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] brewed toxins, poisons, and venomous concoctions for the Vipers. [PAWN_pronoun] experimented with different snake venoms to create ever-deadlier mixtures.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper scale warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wore armor decorated with snake scales and fought with serpentine grace. [PAWN_pronoun] believed the spirit of snakes guided [PAWN_possessive] strikes.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper desert stalker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tracked prey across the Mojave desert for the Vipers, moving silently like a serpent hunting in the sand. [PAWN_pronoun] struck without warning, then vanished.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper toxic shaman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a spiritual guide for the Vipers, interpreting snake movements as divine messages. [PAWN_pronoun] conducted rituals involving venom consumption and serpent worship.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper envenomated marksman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in long-range kills with poisoned arrows and bullets. [PAWN_pronoun] could drop targets from afar, letting venom do the rest of the work.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper serpent guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] protected Viper camps and holy sites from intruders. [PAWN_pronoun] guarded the sacred snakes with deadly devotion, killing anyone who threatened them.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper convert maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] captured wastelanders and forced them to join the Vipers through indoctrination and torture. [PAWN_pronoun] broke minds and forged new believers in the Great Serpent.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper venom addict
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] regularly ingested small doses of snake venom to build immunity. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] became addicted to the rush, craving the toxin's effects.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper ritual slayer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed ritual sacrifices to the Great Serpent, using venom-coated blades to send victims to their god. [PAWN_pronoun] believed each death fed the serpent's power.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scavenged the wasteland for snake habitats, collecting venom and hunting for food. [PAWN_pronoun] survived by knowing where serpents nested and how to avoid their strikes.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper venom warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a frontline fighter for the Vipers, wielding poisoned weapons in close combat. [PAWN_pronoun] reveled in watching enemies succumb to venom after the battle ended.

BackstoryDef.title: Viper serpent whisperer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] claimed to communicate with snakes, understanding their needs and desires. Whether this was true or madness, the Vipers revered [PAWN_objective] as touched by the divine serpent.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged initiate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Forged, a gang obsessed with fire and its purifying power. [PAWN_pronoun] underwent the brutal initiation of being branded with red-hot metal.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged flamewielder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wielded fire as a weapon, using flamethrowers and molotovs to burn enemies alive. [PAWN_pronoun] believed fire was the ultimate purifier.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged blacksmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the forges at Saugus Ironworks, crafting weapons and armor in the sacred flames. [PAWN_pronoun] believed metal shaped by fire carried its purifying essence.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged fire preacher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] preached the gospel of fire to the Forged, spreading their belief that flame cleanses all impurities. [PAWN_pronoun] converted others through zealous sermons and demonstrations of fire's power.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged incinerator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in burning down settlements and structures for the Forged. [PAWN_pronoun] took pleasure in watching buildings collapse in flames.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged burnt one
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] survived severe burns that would have killed most people. The Forged revered [PAWN_objective] as blessed by fire, bearing scars as proof of the flame's favor.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged molotov maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted incendiary weapons for the Forged - molotovs, fire bombs, and flaming projectiles. [PAWN_pronoun] constantly experimented with new ways to spread fire.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged firewalk warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] charged through flames without fear, fighting enemies in burning buildings. The Forged believed [PAWN_pronoun] was immune to fire's wrath.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged arsonist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] set fires across the Commonwealth for the Forged, watching settlements burn and rejoicing in the flames. [PAWN_pronoun] saw beauty in destruction by fire.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged forge master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended the sacred forges at Saugus Ironworks, ensuring the flames never died. [PAWN_pronoun] held high rank in the Forged for keeping the eternal fire burning.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged flame keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained the Forged's ritual fires and led fire-worship ceremonies. [PAWN_pronoun] taught newcomers that fire was the path to strength and purity.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged scorched raider
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] raided with fire as [PAWN_possessive] primary weapon, leaving nothing but ash and char in [PAWN_possessive] wake. [PAWN_pronoun] believed fire made [PAWN_objective] invincible.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged brand master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] branded new members of the Forged with red-hot iron, marking them as part of the flame. [PAWN_pronoun] took pride in scarring flesh as an act of devotion.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged inferno enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enforced the Forged's will through fire and violence. [PAWN_pronoun] punished traitors and weaklings by burning them alive as examples.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged combustion sniper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used incendiary rounds to ignite targets from afar. [PAWN_pronoun] loved watching victims run in flames, trying desperately to extinguish themselves.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged pyro berserker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] entered frenzied rages fueled by fire worship. [PAWN_pronoun] charged into battle wielding flaming weapons, burning everything in reach.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged flamer technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained and repaired flamethrowers for the Forged. [PAWN_pronoun] understood the mechanics of spreading fire better than anyone.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged ashwalker scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scouted targets for the Forged to burn, marking settlements and caravans for fiery destruction. [PAWN_pronoun] walked through ash and smoke like a ghost.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged flame acolyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied the philosophy of fire under the Forged's leaders. [PAWN_pronoun] believed that only through fire could humanity be cleansed and reborn.

BackstoryDef.title: Forged burning executioner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carried out executions for the Forged by immolating prisoners. [PAWN_pronoun] believed death by fire was the holiest way to die.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion street thug
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran with the Scorpions, a small-time street gang in Freeside. [PAWN_pronoun] mostly shook down locals and got into fights with other gangs.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion pickpocket
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the crowds in Freeside for the Scorpions, lifting caps and valuables from tourists and wastelanders. [PAWN_pronoun] had quick hands but little ambition.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion chem pusher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dealt chems on the streets for the Scorpions, selling jet and psycho to addicts. It wasn't glamorous, but it paid the bills.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion alley muscle
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] provided muscle for the Scorpions' protection rackets, intimidating shopkeepers into paying for "protection." [PAWN_pronoun] was a bully, nothing more.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion lookout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a lookout for Scorpion operations, watching for Kings enforcers and NCR military police. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most nights on rooftops, bored and cold.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion gang recruit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Scorpions as a lowly recruit, doing grunt work and taking beatings from the Kings. [PAWN_pronoun] never rose through the ranks.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion racketeer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran protection rackets for the Scorpions, collecting "insurance" from Freeside businesses. Most paid up to avoid trouble.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion street brawler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] got into constant fistfights with other gangs over territory. The Scorpions valued [PAWN_objective] for being willing to throw punches, even if they usually lost.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion petty criminal
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] committed small-time crimes for the Scorpions - breaking windows, stealing supplies, vandalism. [PAWN_pronoun] was more nuisance than threat.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion alley runner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran messages and packages between Scorpion members, navigating Freeside's back alleys. [PAWN_pronoun] knew every shortcut and hiding spot.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion stash keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded the Scorpions' stashes of stolen goods and contraband. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't trusted with anything important, just watching junk.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion gambler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran illegal gambling operations for the Scorpions in back-alley card games. [PAWN_pronoun] cheated when possible and lost money when caught.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion vandal
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spray-painted Scorpion tags across Freeside and smashed rival gang symbols. [PAWN_pronoun] thought this made [PAWN_objective] tough.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion street hustler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran scams and cons for the Scorpions, tricking tourists out of caps with rigged games and fake goods. [PAWN_pronoun] talked a good game but wasn't clever enough for big scores.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion junk dealer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fenced stolen goods for the Scorpions, selling junk and contraband to whoever would buy. [PAWN_pronoun] dealt in low-quality merchandise no one else wanted.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion bar bouncer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as muscle at Scorpion-controlled bars in Freeside, throwing out drunks and troublemakers. [PAWN_pronoun] broke up more bar fights than actual threats.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion two-bit enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enforced the Scorpions' will on the streets, roughing up people who didn't pay or disrespected the gang. [PAWN_pronoun] was small-time muscle at best.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion street addict
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a chem addict who ran with the Scorpions for access to drugs. [PAWN_pronoun] did odd jobs for the gang in exchange for jet and psycho.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion squatter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in abandoned buildings claimed by the Scorpions, surviving on scraps and petty theft. The gang tolerated [PAWN_objective] as long as [PAWN_pronoun] helped when needed.

BackstoryDef.title: Scorpion gang hanger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] hung around with the Scorpions without being a real member, doing favors and running errands hoping to get initiated. [PAWN_pronoun] never quite made it in.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend psycho addict
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Fiends and became hopelessly addicted to Psycho. [PAWN_pronoun] lived in a constant drug-fueled haze of violence and rage, barely human anymore.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend cannibal raider
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed a taste for human flesh while raiding with the Fiends. [PAWN_pronoun] ate victims after battles, believing it made [PAWN_objective] stronger.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend chem cooker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] cooked chems for the Fiends, producing Psycho, Jet, and other drugs that fueled the gang's violent rampages. [PAWN_pronoun] sampled the product constantly.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend torturer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tortured captives for the Fiends' entertainment, using drugs to keep victims conscious through unimaginable pain. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed every moment.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend Vault 3 massacrer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the Fiends' massacre of Vault 3's peaceful inhabitants. [PAWN_pronoun] slaughtered men, women, and children without mercy in a drug-fueled frenzy.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend jet junkie
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was hopelessly addicted to Jet, requiring constant fixes to function. [PAWN_pronoun] raided for the Fiends to feed [PAWN_possessive] addiction.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend berserker killer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] flew into drug-induced rages during raids, attacking anything that moved. The Fiends pointed [PAWN_objective] at enemies and watched the carnage unfold.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend lieutenant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a lieutenant under Motor-Runner, organizing raids and distributing chems. [PAWN_pronoun] was as brutal and drug-addled as any Fiend, but clever enough to lead.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend flamer maniac
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wielded a flamethrower for the Fiends, burning everything in sight while high on chems. [PAWN_pronoun] laughed as victims burned alive.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend trophy collector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] collected trophies from victims - teeth, fingers, scalps. [PAWN_pronoun] decorated Vault 3 with macabre displays of the dead.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend chem gunner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought for the Fiends while pumped full of combat chems. [PAWN_pronoun] could take multiple bullets and keep fighting until the drugs wore off.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend screamer killer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was known for screaming incoherently during raids, high on a cocktail of chems. [PAWN_pronoun] terrified victims before killing them.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend NCR hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in ambushing NCR patrols for the Fiends. [PAWN_pronoun] took perverse pleasure in killing soldiers and looting their corpses.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend Vault scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scavenged Vault 3 for supplies and weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] picked through the remains of the vault dwellers [PAWN_pronoun] helped massacre.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend chem pusher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] distributed chems within the Fiends, ensuring everyone stayed high and violent. [PAWN_pronoun] controlled the supply and used it for power.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend savage butcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] butchered human corpses for the Fiends to consume. [PAWN_pronoun] prepared "meat" from raids, treating human flesh like any other food.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend crazed sniper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] picked off targets from afar while high on chems. [PAWN_pronoun] giggled while watching victims die through a scope.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend wasteland terror
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was feared across the Mojave as a Fiend killer. [PAWN_pronoun] left trails of bodies and destruction wherever [PAWN_pronoun] went, fueled by endless chems.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend chem bomber
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] created explosive devices for the Fiends, often while high on their own products. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed blowing things up as much as the drugs.

BackstoryDef.title: Fiend mutilator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in mutilating corpses after raids, leaving horrific displays to terrorize the wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] considered it art.

BackstoryDef.title: born into slavery
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born a slave and witnessed the brutality of slavers firsthand. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that power comes from owning others.

BackstoryDef.title: orphaned by slaver raid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] watched slavers kill [PAWN_possessive] parents and take everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to never be a victim again.

BackstoryDef.title: Pitt child worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up working the steel mills in The Pitt as a child slave. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that cruelty kept others in line.

BackstoryDef.title: overseer's child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a slave overseer and learned to see captives as property. [PAWN_pronoun] helped discipline slaves from a young age.

BackstoryDef.title: collar maker's apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] apprenticed with a collar maker, learning to craft the devices that kept slaves obedient. [PAWN_pronoun] saw people as necks waiting for collars.

BackstoryDef.title: captive child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured as a child and sold multiple times. [PAWN_pronoun] learned manipulation and decided to become the master instead of the slave.

BackstoryDef.title: Paradise Falls brat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in Paradise Falls surrounded by slavers. [PAWN_pronoun] tormented slave children and learned the trade early.

BackstoryDef.title: runaway slave caught
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tried to escape slavery but was caught and punished severely. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to join the slavers to avoid being on the bottom.

BackstoryDef.title: auction house child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up watching slave auctions, learning to appraise human value in caps. [PAWN_pronoun] saw people as investments.

BackstoryDef.title: betrayer's child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] betrayed other slave children to slavers for better treatment. [PAWN_pronoun] learned early that loyalty meant nothing.

BackstoryDef.title: raised by raiders
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up among the Jackals, learning violence before learning to read. [PAWN_pronoun] saw brutality as normal life.

BackstoryDef.title: war orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] family to raiders and joined the Jackals for survival. [PAWN_pronoun] became what [PAWN_pronoun] once feared.

BackstoryDef.title: pack runt
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the smallest in the Jackal pack and had to fight for scraps. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to be vicious to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: child scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scavenged battlefields for the Jackals as a child, stripping corpses for loot. [PAWN_pronoun] grew numb to death.

BackstoryDef.title: child soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to fight for the Jackals from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] killed for the first time before puberty.

BackstoryDef.title: cannibal child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was introduced to cannibalism young in the Jackal camp. [PAWN_pronoun] ate human flesh to survive starvation.

BackstoryDef.title: wasteland feral child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived like an animal in the wasteland before the Jackals took [PAWN_objective] in. [PAWN_pronoun] never fully learned civilization.

BackstoryDef.title: child chem runner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran chems for the Jackals as a child, too young to be suspected. [PAWN_pronoun] sampled the merchandise early.

BackstoryDef.title: raider brat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the Jackal gang and raised with no morals. [PAWN_pronoun] tortured animals and weaker children for fun.

BackstoryDef.title: child lookout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a lookout for Jackal raids, small enough to hide easily. [PAWN_pronoun] watched people die from safe distances.

BackstoryDef.title: snake cult child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the Viper cult, taught to worship snakes and venom. [PAWN_pronoun] believed serpents were divine from birth.

BackstoryDef.title: venom taster child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] built immunity to snake venom through controlled doses as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] suffered through agonizing "training" rituals.

BackstoryDef.title: serpent tender child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] cared for the Vipers' sacred snakes from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to handle venomous serpents safely.

BackstoryDef.title: ritual victim survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] survived a Viper sacrifice ritual and was taken into the cult. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to worship the serpent that spared [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: poison apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] apprenticed with Viper poison makers, learning to extract and mix venoms. [PAWN_pronoun] accidentally poisoned [PAWN_objective]self multiple times.

BackstoryDef.title: desert nomad child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the Mojave with the Vipers, learning to survive in harsh desert. [PAWN_pronoun] hunted snakes and other wildlife.

BackstoryDef.title: cannibal cult child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in Viper cannibalistic rituals as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] ate human flesh as part of religious ceremonies.

BackstoryDef.title: venom gatherer child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] gathered snake venom from the wild for the Vipers. [PAWN_pronoun] was bitten many times learning to "milk" snakes.

BackstoryDef.title: scale-tattooed child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tattooed with snake scales as a young child, marking [PAWN_objective] as property of the cult. [PAWN_pronoun] wore the marks proudly.

BackstoryDef.title: fangless serpent
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the Vipers but lacked the fierceness of others. [PAWN_pronoun] worked as support, preparing poisons and tending snakes.

BackstoryDef.title: fire child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by the Forged, taught that fire was sacred. [PAWN_pronoun] played with flames while other children played with toys.

BackstoryDef.title: burn victim child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was badly burned as a child and taken in by the Forged. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to see scars as blessings from the flame.

BackstoryDef.title: forge apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] apprenticed at Saugus Ironworks, working the forges from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] burned [PAWN_objective]self repeatedly learning the craft.

BackstoryDef.title: ash walker child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up walking through ashes of the Forged's fires. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to find beauty in destruction and rebirth through flame.

BackstoryDef.title: pyromaniac child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed pyromanic tendencies young and was welcomed by the Forged. [PAWN_pronoun] set fires constantly, encouraged by the cult.

BackstoryDef.title: branded child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was branded with hot iron as an initiation into the Forged. [PAWN_pronoun] bore the mark as proof of devotion to fire.

BackstoryDef.title: fuel gatherer child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] gathered combustibles for the Forged's fires. [PAWN_pronoun] scavenged oil, wood, and anything that would burn.

BackstoryDef.title: flame bearer child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carried torches for the Forged during nighttime rituals. [PAWN_pronoun] was honored to bear the sacred flame.

BackstoryDef.title: child molotov mixer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped mix molotov cocktails for the Forged. [PAWN_pronoun] burned [PAWN_objective]self several times but kept working.

BackstoryDef.title: scorched orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] family to fire and was taken in by the Forged. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to worship what destroyed [PAWN_possessive] world.

BackstoryDef.title: Freeside urchin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on Freeside's streets, scraping by on scraps and petty theft. [PAWN_pronoun] ran with the Scorpions for protection.

BackstoryDef.title: street pickpocket
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to pick pockets as a child in Freeside. [PAWN_pronoun] stole to eat and gave some to the Scorpions for protection.

BackstoryDef.title: alley rat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in Freeside's alleys, too poor for proper shelter. [PAWN_pronoun] scavenged trash and did small jobs for the Scorpions.

BackstoryDef.title: beggar child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] begged on Freeside's streets for caps and food. [PAWN_pronoun] sometimes spied for the Scorpions in exchange for protection.

BackstoryDef.title: runaway kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran away from home and ended up in Freeside. [PAWN_pronoun] fell in with the Scorpions as the only family [PAWN_pronoun] had left.

BackstoryDef.title: gang errand boy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran errands for the Scorpions as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] delivered messages and packages without asking what was inside.

BackstoryDef.title: street fighter child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] got into constant fights with other street kids in Freeside. [PAWN_pronoun] earned a reputation among the Scorpions as a scrapper.

BackstoryDef.title: junk scavenger child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scavenged junk from Freeside's ruins to sell. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to spot valuable trash and trade with the Scorpions.

BackstoryDef.title: gambling child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned card tricks and gambling from Scorpion members. [PAWN_pronoun] hustled tourists for pocket change.

BackstoryDef.title: orphan squatter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] squatted in abandoned Freeside buildings with other orphans. [PAWN_pronoun] survived under Scorpion "protection" by paying tribute.

BackstoryDef.title: Vault 3 massacre orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed the Fiends massacre [PAWN_possessive] family in Vault 3. [PAWN_pronoun] joined the killers to survive, losing all humanity.

BackstoryDef.title: child chem addict
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was addicted to chems from a young age by Fiend adults. [PAWN_pronoun] never knew sobriety or normalcy.

BackstoryDef.title: Motor-Runner's pup
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by Motor-Runner's gang, taught violence and drug use from birth. [PAWN_pronoun] knew nothing but the Fiend lifestyle.

BackstoryDef.title: cannibal youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ate human flesh as a child in the Fiend camps. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a taste for it and never looked back.

BackstoryDef.title: torture witness child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] watched Fiends torture captives as entertainment growing up. [PAWN_pronoun] became desensitized to suffering.

BackstoryDef.title: psycho child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fed Psycho as a child to make [PAWN_objective] violent and controllable. [PAWN_pronoun] became addicted and dependent.

BackstoryDef.title: child raid spotter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spotted targets for Fiend raids as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] helped select victims and watched them die.

BackstoryDef.title: chem cook helper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted Fiend chem cooks from a young age, inhaling fumes and sampling products. [PAWN_pronoun] was often high on accidental exposure.

BackstoryDef.title: feral drug child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up feral among the Fiends, more animal than human. [PAWN_pronoun] attacked viciously and had no social skills.

BackstoryDef.title: child corpse scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scavenged corpses after Fiend raids, stripping bodies of valuables. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to see dead bodies as loot containers.
